section.title: UFMControl via CVS
section.p: It is possible to download all sources via a CVS client or browse a particular file through Web interface.

ul.li:
Local copy through CVS client
To get the sources, run these commands:
[If it does not exist]
touch ~/.cvspass
[If you use a csh]
setenv CVSROOT ':pserver:anonymous@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/ufmcontrol'
[or for a Bourne shell]
export CVSROOT=':pserver:anonymous@cvs.sourceforge.net:/cvsroot/ufmcontrol'
cvs login
[password: <Return>]
cvs -z8 export -r TAG ufmcontrol
[replace TAG with RELENG_0_1, RELENG_0_2 or HEAD]
cvs logout
